actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish a pilot program to address technology-related abuse in domestic violence cases.
short_title: Tech Safety for Victims of Domestic Violence, Dating Violence, Sexual Assault, and Stalking Act

summary.text:
Tech Safety for Victims of Domestic Violence, Dating Violence, Sexual Assault, and Stalking Act

This bill establishes a pilot program for the Office on Violence Against Women to award grants to reduce domestic violence that occurs using any form of technology.

titles.title: Tech Safety for Victims of Domestic Violence, Dating Violence, Sexual Assault, and Stalking Act
A bill to establish a pilot program to address technology-related abuse in domestic violence cases.
